</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	Tianjin
	Free Trade Zone International Automall
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	Office
	Tenancy Contract
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Contract
	No.
<B>
<U>
	2016-007
</U>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
	Party A (the Leaser):
<U>
	Tianjin
	Binhai International Automall Co., Ltd.
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
	Party B (the Lessee):
<U>
	Tianjin
	Binhai Shisheng Trading Group Co., Ltd.
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
	In accordance with the
<I>
	Contract
</I>
<I>
	Law of the People&rsquo;s Republic of China
</I>
	, Party A and Party B, upon amicable consultation, hereby agree to enter into
	this Contract for joint compliance and observation with respect to matters of Party B&rsquo;s renting of the office in Party A&rsquo;s
	automobile city.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
<B>
	Article 1.
	The Premises
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
	The
	Premises is located on the
<U>
	ground
</U>
	floor of Tianjin Free Trade Zone International Automall, No.86, Tianbao Avenue, Tianjin
	Free Trade Zone. The area of the office is
<U>
	508.91
</U>
	square meters.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
<B>
	Article 2.
	Lease Term
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
	The
	lease term of this Contract shall be
<U>
	one (1)
</U>
	year from
<U>
	1
<SUP>
	st
</SUP>
	January 2016
</U>
	to
<U>
	31
<SUP>
	st
</SUP>
	December
	2016
</U>
	. Where Party B intends to renew the lease term upon expiration thereof, Party B shall inform Party A in writing
<U>
	thirty
	(30)
</U>
	days (including day-off) prior to the maturity of the lease term, and this Contract may be renewed upon consultation with
	Party A and upon unanimous negotiation by both parties.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
<B>
	Article 3.
	Rental and Payment Method
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
	Upon
	consultation by Party A and Party B, the annual rental of the office shall be
<U>
	One Hundred and Twenty Thousand Yuan (RMB 120,000).
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
	The
	rental shall be payable every half a year. The rental of the first six months shall be
<U>
	Sixty Thousand Yuan Only (RMB 60,000
</U>
	),
	and shall be payable within seven days from the signature date of this Contract. The rental of the next six months shall be payable
	within
<U>
	thirty (30)
</U>
	days prior to the maturity of the first lease term.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1.5PT SOLID">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage121"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
<B>
	Article 4.
	Usage of the Premises
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
	The
	Premises mentioned in this Contract shall only be used as Party B&rsquo;s office.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	Article
	5. Deposit
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Party
	B shall, within three days this Contract is executed, pay
<U>
	RMB 0.00
</U>
	to Party A as a warranty that Party B will perform this
	Contract. Upon termination or expiration of this Contract, Party A shall return the deposit (without any interest) to Party B
	as soon as Party B settles all its outstanding payable charges. Should any loss or damages arise to Party A or any third party
	due to default of Party B, such deposit shall be used for indemnifying such losses or damages. In the event that such deposit
	is insufficient to indemnify such losses or damages, Party B shall pay additional amount as necessary.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 21PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	Article
	6. Relevant Expenses in the Term of Lease
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 2PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Besides the Premises mentioned in this Contract, Party A shall provide Party B with property services including central air-conditioner, public lighting, and public area cleaning and security. Party A shall not charge additional fees for its provision of the above-mentioned services.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	2.
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	Other expenses if incurred shall be borne by Party B upon two parties&rsquo; consultation.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 21PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	Article
	7. Principles for handling facilities installed by Party B in the Term of Lease
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 2PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Party B may, upon Party A&rsquo;s consent, install other facilities inside the Premises without prejudice to the existing facilities of Party A.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;When the term of lease expires, Party A may, at its own option, keep the above-mentioned facilities or request Party B to remove them and restore to the original state. Where Party A determines to keep them, no compensation shall be made to Party B.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 21PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	Article
	8. Two parties&rsquo; rights and obligations
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Two parties acknowledge that the
<I>
	User Manual of Tianjin Free Trade Zone Automobile City
</I>
	(hereinafter referred to as
<I>
	User Manual)
</I>
	and
<I>
	Safety Responsibility Agreement
</I>
	shall be attachment to this tenancy contract. Such attachment has been delivered by Party A to Party B upon signing of this Contract (Party B is required to affix receipt stamp to the last page of this Contract). Two parties shall comply with this Contract, as well as the provisions of the
<I>
	User Manual
</I>
	and the
<I>
	Safety Responsibility Agreement
</I>
	. The attachment hereto shall have the equal legal effect as of this Contract.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Besides observing the provisions of this Contract and the
<I>
	User Manual
</I>
	, Party B shall obey the management given by Party A and its working staff. In the lease term, should Party A need to decorate the office, Party B shall give cooperation thereto.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 2; OPTIONS: NEWSECTION; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1.5PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

	&nbsp;

	2
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->

</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage122"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Party B shall not early terminate the lease term without Party A&rsquo;s consent.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	4. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Party A shall not early cancel this Contract without acceptable reason. In case Party A early terminate this Contract with no good reason, Party A shall return to Party B the rental already paid by Party B but yet to expire.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	5. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Party B agrees that where Party B fails to pay Party A the rental and other expenses, Party A may withhold Party B&rsquo;s office supplies. In the event that Party B is unable to pay the above-said expenses within the period of time specified by Party A, Party A may auction or sell any item withheld. Proceeds from such auction or sale shall be prioritized to cover Party A&rsquo;s loss; Party A shall return the balance thereof if any to Party B; in case such proceeds are insufficient to cover Party A&rsquo;s loss, Party A may continue to demand indemnification.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	6. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Neither party hereto shall assume indemnity liability to each other in case of loss of life and property due to force majeure.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	Article
	9. Amendment, Rescission or Termination of the Contract
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Supplement or amendment may be made to this Contract upon unanimous consultation of two parties hereto. Such supplement or amendment shall be made in writing, and shall have the equal effect as of this Contract upon signature and stamp by both parties hereto.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Where Party B violates the provisions of this Contract and the
<I>
	User Manual
</I>
	, Party A may early terminate this Contract without return of the rental already paid by Party B, and demand indemnification for other expenses payable by Party B or for Party A&rsquo;s loss as a result of such violation.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Party B may early rescind this Contract should Party A fail to comply with the provisions of this Contract and the
<I>
	User Manual
</I>
	. In case Party B early terminates this Contract for which Party A is held responsible, Party A shall return the rental already paid by Party B but yet to expire, and Party B may demand indemnification for other loss it may suffer.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	4.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This Contract shall cease to be valid upon the expiration of the performance period. In case two parties have no intention for renewal of the lease term, Party B shall move out of the Premises and return to Party A the Premises and related facilities on the expiration date of the lease term. Should Party B fail to do so within specified period of time, Party B shall pay an amount at
<U>
	twice
</U>
	the rental of this Contract for each day delayed as penalty.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 21PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 21PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
</FONT>
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 3; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1.5PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%">
	&nbsp;

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 34%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	3
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">

<A NAME="eolPage123"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 21PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	Article
	10. Liabilities for breach of the contract by two parties
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 2PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Any violation of the obligations specified in this Contract, the
<I>
	User Manual
</I>
	and the
<I>
	Safety Responsibility Agreement
</I>
	by either party hereto shall constitute breach of this Contract. Therefore, the observing party shall have the right to request the other party to assume default liability and indemnity liability in accordance with the provisions of this Contract and legal regulations and rules.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Where Party B fails to pay the rental at the time agreed in this Contract, Party B shall undertake default liability to Party A and pay Party A an amount at
<U>
	twice
</U>
	the rental as agreed in this Contract for each day delayed as penalty, and Party A may execute its right to cancel this Contract.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Party A shall deliver the Premises to Party B within
<U>
	three (3)
</U>
	days when Party B has paid the rental of first six months. Should Party A fail to do so, an amount
<U>
	twice
</U>
	the rental as agreed in this Contract shall be payable to Party B as penalty.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	4.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In case of inability to perform this Contract due to policies of the State and local government&rsquo;s management department, neither party shall assume default liabilities to each other.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	Article
	11. Contractual Dispute Settlement Method
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 2PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Dispute
	arising from the performance of this Contract shall be settled through consultation by two parties hereto; if no agreement can
	be reached, either party hereto may bring the case in dispute to the people&rsquo;s court of jurisdiction. In case of any change
	in the jurisdiction of local people&rsquo;s court on the case, two parties agree to take the place where Premises situates as
	the place for performance of this Contract, and the prosecutor shall initiate a proceeding at such place where this Contract is
	performed.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 21PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	Article
	12.
</B>
	This Contract is made in five copies, and two parties shall retain two copies thereof respectively, and the last
	copy shall be furnished to the management department for record-filing. This Contract shall come into effect upon signature
	and stamp by two parties hereto and upon Party B&rsquo;s payment of rental for the first six months to Party A. In case this
	Contract is not in line with relevant contracts previously executed by both parties hereto, this Contract shall prevail, and
	such relevant contracts shall automatically be terminated.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 21PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 60%; PADDING: 0 0 0 24PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Party
	A:
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 40%; PADDING: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Party
	B:
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<TD STYLE="PADDING: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">

<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	(signature
	and stamp)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">

</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_CERTIFICATION>

	on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact

	registrant&rsquo;s other certifying officers and I are responsible for establishing and
	maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e)
	and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange
	Act Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for the registrant and we have:

</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	designed
	such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures
	to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to
	the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others
	within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</FONT>
</TD>

	such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over

<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_32"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	Exhibit
	32.1

<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
</P>
<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION_3"></A>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	CERTIFICATION
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	Pursuant
	to Section 906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	(Subsections
	(a) and (b) of Section 1350, Chapter 63 of Title 18, United States Code)
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Pursuant
	to section 906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002 (subsections (a) and (b) of section 1350, chapter 63 of title 18, United States
	Code), each of the undersigned officers of China Auto Logistics Inc., a Nevada corporation (the &ldquo;Company&rdquo;), does hereby
	certify, to such officer&rsquo;s knowledge, that:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	The
	Annual Report on Form 10-K for the year ended December 31, 2015 (the &ldquo;Form 10-K&rdquo;) of the Company fully complies with
	the requirements of section 13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, and information contained in the Form 10-K
	fairly presents, in all material respects, the financial condition and results of operations of the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
